# The `AsmPrinterHandler` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Collects and handles <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> objects required to build debug or EH information. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Collects and handles <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> objects required to build debug or EH information.

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/asmprinterhandler-h">AsmPrinterHandler.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### beginBasicBlockSection() {#acb5daf26600bfc80576126ff2a5249df}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::AsmPrinterHandler::beginBasicBlockSection (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the beginning of a new basic-block-section within a function.

Always called immediately after beginFunction for the first basic-block. When basic-block-sections are enabled, called before the first block of each such section.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/asmprinterhandler-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/asmprinterhandler-h">AsmPrinterHandler.h</a>.

Every beginFunction(MF) call should be followed by an endFunction(MF) call.

### endBasicBlockSection() {#a97157d050e1859f58eff10b1f0bf0c46}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::AsmPrinterHandler::endBasicBlockSection (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the end of a basic-block-section within a function.

When basic-block-sections are enabled, called after the last block in each such section (including the last section in the function). When basic-block-sections are disabled, called at the end of a function, immediately prior to markFunctionEnd.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/asmprinterhandler-h/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/asmprinterhandler-h">AsmPrinterHandler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
